> 
> *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 136922 ***

That's weird. I did a Bugzilla search before submitting this issue for all open or resolved items that contains "xmleditor" or "XMLBuildermap_toc" in the summary and it returned zero results. Sorry for filling this dup.
No worries. I'd always prefer that you file the dup than not file at all.
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
